price: Kuma yãyã kuke kãfircẽwa alhãli kuwa anã karanta ãyõyin Allah a gare ku, kuma a cikinku akwai manzonSa? Kuma wanda ya nẽmi tsari da Allah, to, an shiryar da shi zuwa ga hanya miƙaƙƙiya.
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَكۡفُرُونَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ وَفِيكُمۡ رَسُولُهُۥۗ وَمَن يَعۡتَصِم بِٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ هُدِيَ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
